action.action-desc: Mr. Bean of Florida submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: To establish the Members’ Representational Allowance for each Member of the House of Representatives for fiscal years 2026 and 2027 as the amount of the Allowance for fiscal year 2025, reduced by $100,000.

section.text: This resolution may be cited as the Put Your Money Where Your Mouth Is Resolution.

section.header: Establishment of Members’ Representational Allowance for Fiscal Years 2026 and 2027

subsection.text: The Members’ Representational Allowance established under section 101 of the House of Representatives Administrative Reform Technical Corrections Act (2 U.S.C. 5341) shall, for each Member or Member-elect of the House, be equal to—

paragraph.text: the amount of such Allowance with respect to the district from which the Member or Member-elect is elected for fiscal year 2025; reduced by

subsection.text: This section shall apply with respect to fiscal year 2026 and fiscal year 2027.
